Module proto4j.swing
Package org.proto4j.swing.laf

Interface LAFChangeListener

public interface LAFChangeListener
The base class for all component oriented listeners. There are three kinds if states that will be provided within the state parameter:
  • SETUP: setup call for the underlying Look And Feel
  • INSTALL: apply the underlying LAF to the given * Component
  • UNINSTALL: revert all changes made to the given Component
Since:
1.0

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String INSTALL
    Indicates that the underlying LookAndFeel should be applied to the given Component.
    static java.lang.String SETUP
    Indicates the underlying LookAndFeel should be initialized.
    static java.lang.String UNINSTALL
    Indicates that changes to the given component should be reverted.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void update​(java.lang.String state, java.awt.Component component)
    This method gets called when a bound property of the current look and feel is changed.

      static final java.lang.String SETUP

  • Method Details

    • update

      void update​(java.lang.String state, java.awt.Component component)
      This method gets called when a bound property of the current look and feel is changed.
      Parameters:
      state - the current state; one of: SETUP, INSTALL or UNINSTALL
      component - the component for installing and uninstalling and null if setup is called
